attributes.action: Give children appropriate time for a holiday if attendance is excellent no fines
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to reassess the new fines and not make it for everyone as I feel it's very unfair.
attributes.background: I think it is unfair that the new fines for taking children out of school. If the child has 98 - 100% attendance. Fines shouldn't be applied. A week off for a child that has persistent excellent attendance it's the same as a child being ill for a week or a few days out of the year .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Allow students to be taken out of school for two weeks a year without penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658365
